summary: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.
cast: Brad Pitt|David Thewlis|BD Wong|Mako|Danny Denzongpa|Victor Wong|Ingeborga Dapkunaite|Jamyang Jamtsho Wangchuk|Lhakpa Tsamchoe|Jetsun Pema|Ama Ashe Dongtse|Sonam Wangchuk|Dorjee Tsering|Ric Young|Ngawang Chojor|Duncan Fraser|Benedick Blythe|Tom Raudaschl|Wolfgang Tonninger|Samdup Dhargyal|Chemchok|Tenzin Jangchub|Angphurba Sherpa|Tsering Wangdue|Yama Ngudup Cheshatsang|Kalsang Dhundop Lungtok|Sonam Bidhartsang|Lama Champa Tsondu|Geshe Lobsang Nyma|Geshe Yeshi Tsultrim|Lama Champa Chandu|Pemba Norbu Sherpa|Karma Apo-Tsang|Ngawang Tenzingyatso|Choeden Tsering|Lama Jampa Lekshe|Lama Thupten Nugdup|Daniel Tedeschi|Gerardo Ebert|Sebastian Zevalia|Philipp Kriechbaum|Lobsang Gendun Rinpoche|Tenzin Gyaltsen Rinpoche|Sharpa Tulku Rinpoche|Zongra Tulku Rinpoche|Victor A. Haddox
keywords: tibet|dalai lama|based on real person|20th century|1940s
title: Siete años en el Tíbet
